mapper.insert: INSERT INTO word(wordno, word, rdate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(wordno), 0)+1 as wordno FROM word), #{word}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM word
SELECT wordno, word, rdate FROM word ORDER BY wordno DESC
SELECT max(wordno) KEEP(DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY wordno DESC) FROM word WHERE word = #{word}
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM word WHERE word=#{word} and TO_CHAR(rdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD')=TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
